Tartu linn, Tartumaa

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: The course introduces different approaches, concepts, processes, and supporting factors of co-creation. An important part of the course is gaining practical experience as an observer or participant in a co-creation process. Some parts of the course are designed co-creatively.
description.et: Kursusel tutvutakse koosloome erinevate käsitluste, mõistete, protsessi ja eduteguritega. Kursuse läbimise oluliseks osaks on praktilise kogemuse saamine mingis koosloomeprotsessis vaatleja või osalejana. Mingi osa kursusest pannakse paika koosloomeliselt, samal ajal ka seda protsessi analüüsides.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to get familiar with co-creation and networking to know the possibilities of co-creative approaches and to be able to apply them.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on tutvuda koosloome ja võrgustikutööga, et õppida tundma koosloomeliste lähenemiste võimalusi ning osata neid rakendada.

learning_outcomes.en: * Recognizes and can use the basic concepts of co-creation and networking
learning_outcomes.et: * Tunneb ära ja suudab kasutada koosloome ja võrgustikutöö põhimõisteid

learning_outcomes.en: * Orients in different co-creative methodologies, knows their main advantages and disadvantages and is able to choose them when planning a co-creational process
learning_outcomes.et: * Orienteerub erinevates koosloomelistes metodoloogiates, teab nende põhilisi eeliseid ja puuduseid ning oskab neid protsessi planeerimisel valida

learning_outcomes.en: * Knows the stages of the co-creation process
* Is aware of factors that enable and support co-creation and can apply them consciously
learning_outcomes.et: * On kursis eduteguritega ning oskab neid teadlikult rakendada

learning_outcomes.en: * Has gained experience in participating in or observing co-creation process
learning_outcomes.et: * On omandanud koosloomes osalemise või jälgimise kogemuse
